title: 8 Summer Nail-Art Ideas to Mix Things Up This Season
description: Kids may look forward to summer because it means no school and lots of time off, but we look forward to summer because it means we can finally dig out the summer nail ideas we've been saving over the last few months and get started crossing looks off of our bucket list. Fruit nails? "Digital lavender" hues? "Fishing lure" designs? Check, check, and check. We love each season and the many beauty trends they bring, but there's something about the warm weather and the summer nail designs that come with it that just make us feel good. The nail-polish shades get brighter; the designs, more creative - supplying us with the best of the best ideas. And something tells us this year is going to be better than ever. "I love that everyone has been thinking outside the box in terms of inspiration," celebrity manicurist Tammy Taylor says. "Inspiration can come from anywhere: summer clothing, the beach, festivals, makeup, summer holidays, and the list goes on." So, what summer nail-art designs should you save for your next salon appointment? Keep reading to find out, as some of the industry's top makeup artists share their favorite ideas for inspiration. Experts Featured in This Article Tammy Taylor is a celebrity manicurist and brand founder. Leanne Woodley is a celebrity manicurist. Molly Runty is a nail artist based in Texas. Lyssa Moss is a nail technician at Ripe Hair and Beauty. Kim Truong is a celebrity manicurist.
author: Jessica Harrington
excerpt: For summer nail-art ideas, expect to see watercolor nails, fruit designs, lavender hues, and more. Click here for expert-approved summer nail ideas.
